snippet.title: Aereo preps big Chicago debut
snippet.description: The country's third-biggest city will join New York, Boston, and Atlanta with the online over-the-air broadcast service starting Sept. 13. But other cities, that have yet to be announced, will be getting it sooner.

snippet.title: In Chicago, 'The Bean' is perfect interactive public art
snippet.description: It's hard to imagine anyone not smiling when they visit Anish Kapoor's masterpiece, "Cloud Gate," otherwise known as "The Bean." CNET's Daniel Terdiman made a visit on Road Trip 2013.

snippet.title: Evan Williams' media startup Medium raises $25M
snippet.description: The publishing platform that's a mix between Twitter and Blogger gets a hefty wad of cash in venture capital funding.

snippet.title: In Chicago, the birthplace of the nuclear age (pictures)
snippet.description: Before the Manhattan Project, there was Chicago Pile-1, the first-ever nuclear reactor. On Road Trip 2013, CNET's Daniel Terdiman got a lesson in the birth of sustained chain reactions.

snippet.title: Sprint ramps up 3G, adds Spark LTE network in Chicago
snippet.description: Sprint's customers in Chicago should expect more reliability and faster speeds, the company reported on Tuesday.

snippet.title: Chicago company sues Facebook over Timeline feature
snippet.description: Chicago-based social-scrapbooking company Timelines.com files trademark-infringement suit against Facebook, claiming that Web giant's new profile feature could put Timelines.com out of business.

snippet.title: Aereo delays Chicago launch due to 'issues' on testing site
snippet.description: The Windy City would have been the cloud-based TV provider's biggest new market, but consumers there will have to wait.

snippet.title: Select a startup disk in OS X
snippet.description: Accessing the boot menu in OS X is a simple key press, though in some cases it requires specific timing in order to work.

snippet.title: Kia builds jumbo concept for Chicago
snippet.description: Kia offered a sneak peak at its Cross GT concept ahead of its official unveiling at the Chicago Auto Show.

snippet.title: iControl Networks acquires Piper startup Blacksumac
snippet.description: Blacksumac's $239 Piper all-in-one DIY home security system will add some variety to iControl's current software-based offerings.
